item.title: Mural celebrating archi terrorist, 26th November
item.description:
Mural celebrating archi terrorist Marwan Barguti, who is responsible for the murdering of many Jews, this mural calls for radicalisation and praise for terror.

item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Dangerous traffic situation with fast motorbikes blowing past heavy traffic on zebra crossing, 26th November
item.description:
This is an extremely dangerous area of road, and despite a zebra crossing having been installed a few years ago, motorbikes in particular come very fast down this hill (it seems to be a popular 'rider spot'). This is compounded by the fact that the A2199 experiences very heavy traffic at peak periods because of the school run and the congestion at the Gipsy Hill roundabout. Motorbikes seem to ignore this and come down the outside at speed. The problem is that they cannot see people crossing the zebra crossing, and they DO NOT STOP for it. Twice, my small children have nearly been run over by these motorbikes. There is a nursery school across the road so this zebra crossing is used a great deal by small children and families. Cyclists also come down this hill very fast in the bike lane, so this is also a hazard for the same reasons. Something needs to be done urgently about this problem before someone gets seriously injured or worse. At the very least, a schoolchildren crossing sign needs to be put up, and also possibly a speed trap a little further up the hill to calm the traffic before it gets to this area.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dulwich Wood Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Outside 82 Salusbury Road, NW6 6PA, 26th November
item.description:
The machine to enable motorists to pay for Pay & Display parking is not working properly and has been showing the incorrect time for many weeks now. It needs to be reset to be at the correct time. I hope this can be arranged soon. Thank you
